desc:
Gain a powerful and random reward.

Reward: @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT11_Augment_CallToChaos@
name: Call to Chaos

desc: Gain a Dynamo Emblem, a Miss Fortune, and a BF Sword.
name: Dynamo Circlet

desc: Gain a Syndicate Emblem and a Braum.
name: Syndicate Circlet

desc: Gain a Vanguard Emblem, a Leona, and a Giant's Belt.
name: Vanguard Circlet

desc: Gain an Bastion emblem.
name: Bastion Crest

desc:
Whenever a Bruiser dies, it permanently gains @HealthBonus@ Health.
Gain a Darius and Alistar.
name: Reinforcing Skeleture

desc: After @Delay@ seconds your Divinicorp champions ascend, gaining @BonusHealthPerc*100@% Health and @BonusAttackSpeed*100@% Attack Speed. Gain a Rhaast and a Morgana.
name: Divine Ascension

desc: Your A.M.P. champions with @ItemAmount@ items gain @AmpBonus@ Amp. Gain @Rerolls@ rerolls, a Naafiri, and a Nidalee.
name: Overclocked

desc: Marksmen execute enemies under @ExecutionPercent*100@% Health. Every time a Marksman executes, all Marksman gain @ASBonus*100@% Attack Speed. Gain a Jhin and a Kindred.
name: Flatline

desc: Rapidfire champions start at @StartingStacks@ stacks and can go to @MaxStacks@. If you win combat within @CombatDuration@ seconds, gain @GoldReward@ gold. Gain a Twisted Fate and a Kog'Maw.
name: Speed Kills

desc: Gain a Divinicorp Emblem, a Redemption, and a Rhaast.
name: Divinicorp Crown

desc: Gain a Techie emblem.
name: Techie Crest

desc: Gain a Dynamo emblem.
name: Dynamo Crest

desc: Gain a Dynamo Emblem, a Spear of Shojin, and an Elise.
name: Dynamo Crown

desc: Each Golden Ox drops @GoldDropped@ gold after fighting @TurnsPerGold@ rounds. Your max interest is @InterestCap@. Gain a Graves, an Alistar, and @Gold@ gold.
name: Golden Fleece

desc: Gain a Rapidfire Emblem, a Zeri, and a BF Sword.
name: Rapidfire Circlet

desc:
Anima Squad takedowns have a @DropChance@% chance to drop an XP orb that sells for 1 XP. Anima Squad units gain @AttackSpeed*100@% Attack Speed for each of your player levels. Gain a Seraphine and Illaoi.

@TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT14_Augment_AnimaSquad_Count_Tooltip@
name: Power Leveling

desc: Gain @TOOLTIPNumberOfCopies@ Gragas. Your strongest Gragas's attacks have a chance to knockback and deal bonus magic damage. His ability heals and empowers his next attack.
name: The Chug Bug+

desc: Gain a Slayer Emblem, a Hand of Justice, and a Vayne.
name: Slayer Crown

desc: Gain a Rapidfire emblem.
name: Rapidfire Crest

desc: Gain an Anima Squad Emblem.
name: Anima Squad Crest

desc: Syndicate Kingpins gain @BossAS*100@% Attack Speed and @BossHealth@ Health for each adjacent ally in their row. The allies gain @AllyHealth@ Health. Gain a Twisted Fate and a Darius.
name: Keep Your Friends Close

desc: Gain a Golden Ox Emblem, a Nashor's Tooth, and a Graves.
name: Golden Ox Crown

desc: Gain a Bruiser Emblem, a Crownguard, and a Darius.
name: Bruiser Crown

desc: With Syndicate active, your Training Dummies shoot enemies. Every @NumAttacks@ times they attack, grant the Kingpins @ADAP@% Attack Damage and Ability Power. Gain @NumDummies@ Training Dummy, a Darius, and a Twisted Fate.
name: Dummy With A Gun

desc: Gain a Strategist Emblem, a Yuumi, and a Giant's Belt.
name: Strategist Circlet

desc: Gain a Strategist Emblem, an Adaptive Helm, and an Ekko.
name: Strategist Crown

desc: Gain a Divinicorp Emblem and a Senna.
name: Divinicorp Circlet

desc: Gain an Executioner emblem.
name: Executioner Crest

desc: Your Techies gain @InitialAbilityPower@ Ability Power, increased by @AbilityPower@ for every @NumTakedowns@ takedowns. Gain a Veigar and a Zyra.
name: Cognitive Implant

desc: Gain a Vi. Your strongest Vi gains Attack Speed and her ability dashes to the farthest target within 3-hexes, Stuns, and deals bonus physical damage.
name: Cease and Desist

desc: Gain an Exotech Emblem and a Mordekaiser.
name: Exotech Circlet

desc: Gain a Sylas. Your strongest Sylas's ability deals more damage and recasts on kill, but his Health gain no longer scales with Ability Power.
name: Wolf Unchained

desc: When Techies cast, grant the lowest Health Techie a Shield equal to @ManaConversion*100@% of the Mana spent. Gain a Veigar and a Zyra.
name: Capacitor

desc: Gain a Street Demon emblem.
name: Street Demon Crest

desc:
After @TriggerDelay@ seconds in combat, a support spire grants Anima Squad a Shield, Attack Speed, or Stuns all enemies. Gain 3 Anima Squad champions.

@TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT14_Augment_AnimaSquad_SupportSpire_TRA@
name: Support Spire

desc: Your units gain @BaselineHP*100@% health every round. If they survive combat, they gain an additional @BonusAP@ Ability Power and @BonusAD*100@% Attack Damage.
name: Lifelong Learning

desc: Vanguards gain @BonusHealth*100@% Health. When the Vanguard Shield ends, deal @ExplosionDamage*100@% of the initial Shield as magic damage to their current target. Gain a Skarner and a Vi.
name: Reactive Shell

desc: When you 3-star Nitro champions, they gain @BonusAD*100@% Attack Damage, @BonusAP@ Ability Power, and grant @Gold@ Gold. Gain a Kindred and a Nidalee.
name: Polished Chrome

desc: When A.M.P. champions die, the nearest A.M.P. champion gains @AmpBonus@ Amp until the end of combat. Gain a Naafiri and a Nidalee.
name: Transference

desc:
Executioners have a @GoldDropChance*100@% chance to drop a gold when their attacks critically strike. Gain a Graves and Rengar.

Gold Gained: @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT14_Augment_CutpurseGold@
name: Cutpurse

desc: Every @NumRockets@ Boombot rockets, fire an HK Missile at the current target that deals @DamageRatio*100@% of the original rocket's damage. Gain a Kog'Maw and a Skarner.
name: Hunter Killer Missile

desc: Gain a Street Demon Emblem and a Jinx.
name: Street Demon Circlet

desc: Gain a Bruiser emblem.
name: Bruiser Crest

desc: Gain a Marksman Emblem, an Infinity Edge, and a Jhin.
name: Marksman Crown

desc: Gain a BoomBot Emblem, an Ionic Spark, and a Skarner.
name: BoomBot Crown

desc: Gain a Vanguard Emblem, a Protector's Vow, and a Skarner.
name: Vanguard Crown

desc: Gain a Techie Emblem, a Jeweled Gauntlet, and a Shyvana.
name: Techie Crown

desc: Gain a Golden Ox emblem.
name: Golden Ox Crest

desc: Gain a Rhaast. Your strongest Rhaast enters Shadow Assassin form and his ability is replaced with a dash and 1 hex spin. If it kills, he immediately casts again.
name: Alter Ego

desc: Signature Street Demon hexes grant @BonusAS*100@% Attack Speed. Gain 3 Street Demons and @ItemCount@ Spray Can items that create signature Street Demon hexes.
name: Tagging Spree

desc: Gain a Divinicorp emblem.
name: Divinicorp Crest

desc: Slayers above @HealthThreshold*100@% Health gain @AttackDamageBonus*100@% Attack Damage. While under @HealthThreshold*100@%, they gain @OmnivampBonus*100@% Omnivamp. Gain a Vayne and a Shaco.
name: Lethal Rerouting

desc: Gain a Techie Emblem, a Brand, and a Tear of the Goddess.
name: Techie Circlet

desc: If you have @NumDivinicorp@ or fewer Divinicorp champions, their bonuses are increased by @BaseBonus*100@% + @BonusPerStage*100@% for each Stage. Gain a Rhaast and a Morgana.
name: Board of Directors

desc: Gain an Exotech emblem.
name: Exotech Crest

desc: Each Golden Ox drops @GoldDropped@ gold after fighting @TurnsPerGold@ rounds. Your max interest is @InterestCap@. Gain a Graves, an Alistar, and @Gold@ gold.
name: Golden Fleece+

desc: Gain an Anima Squad Emblem and a Yuumi.
name: Anima Squad Circlet

desc: Gain a Bastion Emblem, a Sejuani, and a Giant's Belt.
name: Bastion Circlet

desc: Clear all painted hexes. When Street Demons start combat on a non-tagged hex, tag it. After all hexes are tagged, gain @GoldAmt@ gold. Gain 3 Street Demons.
name: Freestyling

desc: Gain a Rapidfire Emblem, a Giant Slayer, and a Twisted Fate.
name: Rapidfire Crown

desc:
Cyberbosses increase their score when they deal damage. When they reach the next high score, they gain @AttackSpeed*100@% Attack Speed and bonus loot. Gain a Veigar and a Poppy.

@TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT14_Augment_Cyberbosses_Highscore_Tooltip@
name: New High Score

desc: On combat start, up to @MaxNum@ of your Exotech units with @NumItems@ items gain an ideal Exotech item. Gain a Jax and Naafiri.
name: Cyberdeck

desc: Gain a Slayer emblem.
name: Slayer Crest

desc: Gain a Golden Ox Emblem and a Jarvan.
name: Golden Ox Circlet

desc: Gain an Exotech Golem with a copy of each of your Exotech items. It gains @GolemHPPerStar*100@% Health and @GolemADPerStar*100@% Attack Damage per Exotech star level. Gain a Jhin and a Naafiri.
name: Trial Run

desc:
Every @Rounds@ rounds with Strategist active, bet whether you'll win more or lose more. If you're correct, gain @GoldReward@ gold and a random completed item. Gain a LeBlanc and an Ekko.

@TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT14_Augment_Strategist_BetStatus@
name: 10,000 IQ

desc: Gain a Strategist Emblem.
name: Strategist Crest

desc: Gain a Bruiser Emblem, a Gragas, and a Giant's Belt.

desc: Gain a Poppy. Your strongest Poppy's ability is replaced with a 3-hit Wallop.
name: Button Mash

desc: Gain a Marksman emblem.
name: Marksman Crest

desc:
Gain a Jhin and Morgana. Dynamos gain @DamageAmp*100@% Damage Amp. After they spend @ManaNeeded@ Mana, gain a Zhonya's Paradox and an Aurora.

@TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT14_Augment_Thirsty_ManaStored_Tooltip@
name: Memory Bank

desc: When Bastions' start of combat bonus ends, @ConversionRate*100@% of it converts into Attack Damage and Ability Power and they gain @AttackSpeedBonus*100@% Attack Speed. Gain an Illaoi and Jax.
name: Transistor

desc: Gain a Slayer Emblem, a Zed, and a Sparring Gloves.
name: Slayer Circlet

desc: When you trade Cypher Intel, your board and bench is sold for @ValueMultiplier*100@% value and you gain @ReforgerCount@ Reforgers. Gain a Draven.
name: Liquidate

desc: Gain a Jax. Your strongest Jax's attacks deal bonus magic damage every 3rd attack which gets stronger each time. His ability grants Attack Speed.
name: Adaptive Strikes

desc: Gain a Street Demon Emblem, a Guardbreaker, and an Ekko.
name: Street Demon Crown

desc: Cyberboss abilities reduce the target's max Health by @HealthReduction*100@%. Cyberbosses take @DamageReduction*100@% less damage from enemies with less max Health. Gain a Poppy and a Veigar.
name: Cower, Weaklings!

desc: Gain a Syndicate Emblem, an Infinity Edge, and a Darius.
name: Syndicate Crown

desc: Gain a Vanguard Emblem.
name: Vanguard Crest

desc: Gain a Syndicate emblem.
name: Syndicate Crest

desc: Gain a BoomBot Emblem and a Fiddlesticks.

desc: Gain an Executioner Emblem, a Guardbreaker, and a Graves.
name: Executioner Crown

desc: Gain a Bastion Emblem, a Steadfast Heart, and an Illaoi.

desc: Gain @TOOLTIPNumberOfCopies@ Gragas. Your strongest Gragas's attacks have a chance to knockback and deal bonus magic damage. His ability heals and empowers his next attack.
name: The Chug Bug

desc: Gain an Exotech Emblem, a Guinsoo's Rageblade, and a Naafiri.
name: Exotech Crown

desc: Get a Nitro Hex Turret that has @SharePercent*100@% of your total Chrome. Gain a Shyvana.

name: BoomBot Crest

desc: Gain an Executioner Emblem, a Zed, and a Sparring Gloves.
name: Executioner Circlet

desc: Gain an Anima Squad Emblem, an Adaptive Helm, and an Illaoi.
name: Anima Squad Crown

desc: Gain a Marskman Emblem, an Aphelios, and a Recurve Bow.
name: Marksman Circlet

desc: Cypher gains @CombatMultiplier*100@% of its combat bonus now. Gain @KillMultiplier*100@% Intel from kills, but only @LossMultiplier*100@% from losses. Gain a Draven.
name: Hostile Takeover

desc: Gain a Blue Buff. Your units gain @BonusAP@ Ability Power. After casting their Ability, gain @ManaRestore@ Mana.
name: Blue Battery III

desc: Gain a Statikk Shiv and another after @Delay@ player combats. Your Statikk Shivs grant @BonusAS*100@% more Attack Speed and their chain lightning effects deal @tooltipincreaseddamage1*100@-@tooltipincreaseddamage2*100@% more damage (based on stage level).
name: Shock Treatment

desc: Gain a Statikk Shiv and another after @Delay@ player combats. Your Statikk Shivs grant @BonusAS*100@% more Attack Speed and their chain lightning effects deal @tooltipincreaseddamage1*100@-@tooltipincreaseddamage2*100@% more damage (based on stage level).
name: Shock Treatment+

desc: Gain a Titan's Resolve and another after @Delay@ player combats. Your Titan's Resolves can continue stacking to @MaxStacks@ instead of 25. The total resist bonus is increased by @ResistIncrease*100@%.
name: Gargantuan Resolve

desc: Your champions randomly gain one of the following when they are starred up: @BonusHP@ Health, @BonusAS@% Attack Speed, @BonusAD@% Attack Damage, or @BonusAP@ Ability Power.
name: Unstable Evolution

desc: Gain a Titan's Resolve and another after @Delay@ player combats. Your Titan's Resolves can continue stacking to @MaxStacks@ instead of 25. The total resist bonus is increased by @ResistIncrease*100@%.
name: Gargantuan Resolve

desc: Your units that start combat in the back 2 rows gain infinite Attack Range and @AS*100@% Attack Speed.
name: Scoped Weapons II

desc: Your team gains @ADHealthPercent@% of their max Health as Attack Damage and @APHealthPercent@% of their max Health as Ability Power.
name: Titanic Strength

desc: Choose a gold-generating Artifact. Gain a Magnetic Remover and @GoldGranted@ gold.
name: All That Shimmers+

desc: Your team gains @BaseHP@ Health. For each unique item they are holding, your team gains bonus @Health@ Health, @AD*100@ Attack Damage, and @AP@ Ability Power.
name: Item Collector II

desc: For each unique item they are holding, your team gains @AD*100@ Attack Damage and @AP@ Ability Power.
name: Item Collector I

desc: Choose a gold-generating Artifact items and gain a Magnetic Remover.
name: All That Shimmers

desc: Gain 1 random completed item now, and 1 component after @NumRounds@ player combats. Selling champions breaks completed items into components (excluding Tactician's items and Emblems).
name: Salvage Bin

desc: Each round, steal a random @CostLimit@-cost or lower champion from the shop. Gain @Gold@ gold.
name: Firesale

desc:
Gain a Lesser Champion Duplicator. Gain another after @PlayerCombatNum@ player combats.

This item allows you to copy a 3-cost or less champion.
name: Team Building

desc: Gain @Heal@ player health and @Gold@ gold after every player combat. Your Tactician also moves faster.
name: Tiniest Titan

desc: You can always move freely on Carousel rounds. Gain @Gold@ gold.
name: Young and Wild and Free

desc: Gain a random Emblem. After @TurnDelay@ player combats, gain a Tactician's Cape.
name: Tactician's Kitchen

desc:
You earn no interest, but gain @Gold@ gold at the start of every player combat round. Gain @InitialGold@ gold now.

Interest is extra gold you gain per 10g saved.
name: Hustler

desc: Gain a Training Dummy. When it dies @NumDeaths@ times, gain a random Support Item and remove the Training Dummy.
name: Support Mining+

desc: Gain a Crownguard. Your Crownguards' start of combat effect is @effectincrease*100@% stronger and the shield lasts @DurationIncrease@ seconds longer.
name: Crown Guarded

desc: Your champions holding an item gain @HP@ Health and @AD*100@% Attack Damage.
name: Cybernetic Implants III

desc: Every @ManaThreshold@ Mana spent, your units next instance of Ability damage deals an additional @MagicDamage1@-@MagicDamage4@ (based on current Stage) magic damage to the target and a nearby enemy.
name: Luden's Echo III

desc: Your champions holding an item gain @HP@ Health and @AD*100@% Attack Damage.
name: Cybernetic Implants II

desc: Choose 1 of 3 components. For the next @RoundsOfBonusItems@ rounds, gain a copy of that component.
name: Replication

desc: Thief's Gloves will always give your champions ideal items. Gain @NumGloves@ Sparring Gloves.
name: Lucky Gloves+

desc: All your current and future completed items transform into Guinsoo's Rageblades that grant @ResistStackValue@ Armor and Magic Resist. Every @AttacksPerStack@ Rageblade stacks grant @StackValue@% Attack Damage and Ability Power.
name: Anger Issues

desc: Lose all champions on your board and bench. Gain a Training Dummy with @HealthPercent@% of their combined health. The dummy gains @HPPerStage@ Health per stage.
name: Dummify

desc: Each round, gain @FreeRerolls@ free rerolls if you did not buy a champion last round.
name: Patience is a Virtue

desc: You heal for @Omnivamp*100@% of the damage you deal to enemy Tacticians. Your units gain @OmnivampStatBonus*100@% Omnivamp.
name: Vampiric Vitality

desc: The first time you would be eliminated, you escape death and your team permanently gains @Health@ Health, @Resists@ Armor and Magic Resist, and @Omnivamp@% Omnivamp.
name: Last Stand

desc: Gain a Training Dummy and @Gold@ gold. If it is the first to die each player combat, gain @Gold@ gold.
name: Scapegoat

desc: Gain a copy of each 1-cost champion.
name: Missed Connections

desc: Every round, if you're in the bottom @BottomHalf@, your team permanently gains @LoserBoost*100@% Attack Damage and Ability Power. If you're in the top @UpperHalf@, they have @WinningStatBoost*100@% more Health.
name: Scoreboard Scrapper

desc:
Your team gains @DamageAmpBonus*100@% Damage Amp and @DurabilityBonus*100@% Durability for each Bronze-tier trait.

Damage Amp Bonus: @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT_Augment_BronzeForLife_CurrentDamageAmp@%
Durability Bonus: @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT_Augment_BronzeForLife_CurrentDurability@%
name: Bronze For Life II

desc: Gain a Needlessly Large Rod. Your units gain @AP@ Ability Power and @Armor@ Armor.
name: Crown's Will

desc: Gain @numunits@ @Tier@-cost champions. Combat Start: @BuffedNumber@ random @Tier@-cost champions gain @Health@ Health and @AttackSpeed*100@% Attack Speed.
name: Trifecta I

desc: Gain a Training Dummy. When it dies @NumDeaths@ times, gain a random Support Item and remove the Training Dummy.
name: Support Mining

desc: Gain @NumInitialItems@ completed item Anvil. Every time a player is eliminated, choose one of their completed items to keep.
name: Tomb Raider II

desc:
Your team gains @Omnivamp*100@% Omnivamp. Get a bonus of @Gold@ gold when your team first accumulates @HealingThreshold@ total champion healing.

Total Healing: @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT_Augment_WealthyRehabHealing@
name: Health is Wealth II

desc: Gain a Training Dummy with @NumOfEmblems@ permanently attached Emblems. Gain @Gold@ gold.
name: Wandering Trainer II

desc: When you reroll your Shop, gain @XP@ XP. Gain @Gold@ gold.
name: Wise Spending

desc: Gain a Zeke's Herald. Champions buffed by Zeke's also gain @CSBonus*100@% Critical Strike Chance.
name: Flurry of Blows

desc:
Your team gains @Omnivamp*100@% Omnivamp. Get a bonus of @Gold@ gold when your team first accumulates @HealingThreshold@ total champion healing.

Total Healing: @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT_Augment_WealthyRehabHealing@
name: Health is Wealth I

desc: The next non-player combat round will drop an additional Prismatic Orb full of amazing loot.
name: Prismatic Pipeline

desc: Gain @numunits@ @Tier@-cost champions. Allies gain @TeamAttackSpeed*100@% Attack Speed. Combat Start: @BuffedNumber@ random @Tier@-cost champions gain @Health@ Health and @AttackSpeed*100@% Attack Speed.
name: Trifecta II

desc: For the next @NumDead@ players eliminated, choose one of their completed items to keep.
name: Tomb Raider I

desc: Gain a Red Buff, a Blue Buff, and a Champion Duplicator.
name: One Buff, Two Buff

desc: Units that start combat in the back row begin combat at @Health*100@% health but gain @DamageAmp*100@% Damage Amp.
name: Glass Cannon I

desc: Your team gains @critchance@% Critical Strike chance, and their Abilities can critically strike. Critical strikes @ShredSunderPerc*100@% Shred and Sunder the target for @Duration@ seconds.
name: Piercing Lotus II

desc: After casting an Ability, champions gain @Omnivamp*100@% Omnivamp for @Duration@ seconds. Excess healing is converted to a shield up to @MaxShield@ Health.
name: Sated Spellweaver

desc: Your team gains @critchance@% Critical Strike chance, and their Abilities can critically strike. Critical strikes @ShredSunderPerc*100@% Shred and Sunder the target for @Duration@ seconds.
name: Piercing Lotus I

desc: At the start of every round, champions on the @BenchSlots@ rightmost bench slots transform into random champions of the same cost. Gain @Gold@ gold.
name: Pandora's Bench

desc: Your units that start combat in the back row gain @ManaPerAttack@ additional Mana per attack.
name: Manaflow I

desc: Your units that start combat in the back row gain @ManaPerAttack@ additional Mana per attack.
name: Manaflow II

desc: Your max level is 7. Gain @NumItems@ Tactician's Shield which increases your team size by +1, and @AugmentGold@ gold.
name: Max Cap

desc: Buying XP costs 1 less. Gain @Health@ Health and @Rerolls@ free rerolls whenever you level up.
name: Upward Mobility

desc: Your champions holding an item gain @health@ health.
name: Cybernetic Bulk II

desc: Combat start: All champions in your front row become clones of the champion in the center of the row. Clones have @HealthRatio*100@% of their original health, and deal @DamagePenalty*100@% less damage.
name: Hall of Mirrors

desc: Your champions holding an item gain @health@ Health.
name: Cybernetic Bulk III

desc: Your units that start combat next to an ally with over @RequiredHealth@ Health take @DamageReductionPercent@% less damage for the rest of combat.
name: Big Friend I

desc: Your next shop and every @NumRolls@ shops will contain all 3-cost champions. Gain @Rerolls@ rerolls.
name: Rigged Shop+

desc: Your team gains @BaseAS@% Attack Speed now. Each round after, they gain @IncreasePerRound@% more. (current Attack Speed: @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT9_PumpingUpRounds@%)
name: Pumping Up I

desc: Gain a Training Dummy equipped with a random emblem that fires ranged attacks at enemies. It upgrades as the game goes on.
name: Tower Defense

desc:
1-cost and 2-cost units in your shop have a chance to be 2-star. Gain @Gold@ gold.

Current Chances: @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT_Augment_StarryNight_Odds@%
Chances increase with player level.
name: Starry Night+

desc: Gain @Units@ random 1-cost champions now. If your bench is full at the end of player combat, gain @XP@ XP.
name: Cluttered Mind

desc: Gain a random emblem. Now and at the start of each stage, gain a 1-star champion of that trait with a cost equal to the Stage (max 5).
name: Hard Commit

desc: Gain a random item component at the start of the next @roundsofbonusitems@ rounds (including this round).
name: Buried Treasures III

desc: When an enemy dies, the nearest ally is healed for @Heal@.
name: Healing Orbs I

desc: Your units have a rare chance to drop treasure chests when they kill enemy champions.
name: Pirates

desc: After the next @NumStages@ carousels, gain one unit that was not taken and its item. Gain @Gold@ gold.
name: Table Scraps

desc: Each time an ally dies, allies that share at least one trait with them gain @BonusAP@ Ability Power, @BonusAD*100@% Attack Damage, @BonusArmor@ Armor, and @BonusMR@ Magic Resist.
name: Climb The Ladder II

desc:
Gain a Giant Slayer, Guinsoo's Rageblade, a Recurve Bow and a Magnetic Remover.

Useful for Attack Carries!
name: Blinding Speed

desc: Each time an ally dies, allies that share at least one trait with them gain @BonusAP@ Ability Power, @BonusAD*100@% Attack Damage, @BonusArmor@ Armor, and @BonusMR@ Magic Resist.
name: Climb The Ladder I

desc: Thief's Gloves will always give your champions ideal items. Gain @NumGloves@ Sparring Gloves. In @NumRounds@ rounds, get another Sparring Gloves.
name: Lucky Gloves

desc:
Gain @InstantGold@ gold. Each round, gain @GoldRate@ gold for every @TraitsActive@ non-unique traits active.

Gold Bonus: @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT_Augment_DiversifiedPortfolio_GoldReturned@
name: Diversified Portfolio+

desc: Gain a Tactician's Crown. Tactician's Crown, Shield, and Cape grant the holder an additional @BonusAS*100@% Attack Speed, @BonusAD*100@% Attack Damage, and @BonusAP@ Ability Power.
name: Coronation

desc: Gain @NumComponents@ random component and @NumChamps@ random Tier 3 champions.
name: Teaming Up I

desc:
Gain @InstantGold@ gold. Each round, gain @GoldRate@ gold for every @TraitsActive@ non-unique traits active.

Gold Bonus: @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT_Augment_DiversifiedPortfolio_GoldReturned@
name: Diversified Portfolio

desc:
Every @Damage@ damage you deal to enemy tacticians gives you @Gold@ gold.
Total Payouts: @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT11_BloodBankPayoutTotal@ Gold
name: Lunch Money

desc: Your highest Health champion is cloned. The clone has @CloneHealth*100@% bonus Health and @AttackSpeed*100@% bonus Attack Speed but cannot equip items.
name: Woodland Charm

desc: Gain @NumItems@ random Support item and @NumUnits@ random 4-cost champions.
name: Teaming Up II

desc: Enemies have a @LootDropChance*100@% chance to drop loot when killed.
name: Spoils of War I

desc: Gain an Edge of Night. Champions holding this item gain @AS@% Attack Speed.
name: Not Today

desc:
Gain a random two-star @unittier@-cost champion. After @delay@ rounds, gain another copy of them at the start of each round for the rest of the game.

Champion: @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT_Augment_WorthTheWait@
name: Worth the Wait

desc:
Gain a random Emblem and a Reforger.

Reforgers allow you to remake any item.
name: Branching Out+

desc: Open @NumHexes@ portals to Zaun on random hexes in the second row. Any unit that starts combat in a portal gains @Health@ Health and @AttackSpeed*100@% Attack Speed, and drops @Gold@ gold on death.
name: Chemtech Overdrive

desc: Gain @NumItems@ random completed item.
name: Item Grab Bag I

desc:
You no longer gain interest. Gain @Gold@ gold now. Round start: gain @XP@ XP.

Interest is extra gold you gain per 10g saved.
name: Going Long

desc: Now and at the start of the next @NumStages@ stages, roll 3 dice. Gain various rewards based on their total.
name: Expected Unexpectedness

desc: For every @PerSurvivingUnit@ surviving champions after winning a player combat, gain @Gold@ gold. Gain @Experience@ XP.
name: Dominance

desc: Your team gains @AttackSpeed*100@% Attack Speed. Gain @Gold@ gold.
name: Placebo+

desc:
Gain an Infinity Force. After @CombatNum@ player combats, gain another.

Infinity Force: Artifact that offers tons of offensive and defensive stats
name: Phreaky Friday +

desc: Gain a Zz'Rot Portal and another after every @NumberOfCombats@ player combats. Zz'Rot Portal Voidlings gain @BonusAS*100@% Attack Speed and @BonusOmnivamp*100@% Omnivamp.
name: Void Swarm

desc: Your team restores @BaseRegenBonus*100@% of their max Health every @RegenPeriod@ seconds. Increase the healing by @RegenPerMissingHP@% for every 10 missing player Health.
name: Spirit Link

desc: Gain a component anvil and @Gold@ gold.
name: Iron Assets

desc: Shop rerolls are free until the end of this round. Traits and other augments do not benefit from these free Shops. Gain @Gold@ gold.
name: Think Fast

desc: Combat start: Your highest Attack Speed champion gains @AbilityPower@ Ability Power and @AttackSpeed*100@% Attack Speed. Repeat on another ally every @TransferDuration@ seconds.
name: Blazing Soul II

desc: Empower the hex in the center of the third row. Summon a clone of the champion in it with @HealthPercent*100@% base Health and @ManaPercent*100@% increased Mana cost.
name: Cloning Facility

desc: You cannot perform actions for the next @RoundsToSkip@ rounds. Afterwards, gain @Gold@ gold.
name: AFK

desc:
Gain @Gold@ gold. Your max interest is increased to @InterestCap@.

Interest is extra gold you gain per 10g saved.
name: Hedge Fund

desc: Gain @FreeRerolls@ reroll for every @UnitCount@ unique two-cost champions fielded last combat. Gain @NumChampsToGrant@ two-cost unit.
name: Two Much Value

desc:
Gain @LesserDuplicatorAmount@ Lesser Champion Duplicators. Gain @Gold@ gold.

This item allows you to copy a 3-cost or less champion.
name: Heroic Grab Bag+

desc: Gain a spotlight in the back corner of your board. All units in the spotlight gain @DamagePercent*100@% Damage Amp, @OmnivampPercent*100@% Omnivamp, and @ManaPerSecond@ Mana per second.
name: Share the Spotlight

desc: Combat start: Your 2 units furthest from each other form a bond, sharing @PercentShare*100@% of their Armor, Magic Resist, Attack Damage, and Ability Power with each other.
name: Long Distance Pals

desc: Buying XP costs @HealthCost@ player health instead of 4 gold. Heal @Heal@ player health before each player combat.
name: Cruel Pact

desc:
Gain @LesserDuplicatorAmount@ Lesser Champion Duplicators. Gain @Gold@ gold.

This item allows you to copy a 3-cost or less champion.
name: Heroic Grab Bag++

desc: Gain 1 random completed item now, and 1 component after @NumRounds@ player combats. Selling champions breaks completed items into components (excluding Tactician's items and Emblems).
name: Salvage Bin

desc:
Gain a Masterwork Upgrade and @anvils@ component anvil.

Masterwork Upgrade upgrades an item to Radiant!
name: Radiant Refactor

desc: After player combat, gain @winxp@ XP if you won or @lossxp@ XP if you lost.
name: Patient Study

desc: Champions appear in your Shop as if you were 1 level higher. Gain @Gold@ gold.
name: High End Shopping II

desc: You cannot perform actions for the next @RoundsToSkip@ rounds. Afterwards, gain @Anvils@ completed item anvils.
name: BRB

desc: Gain @components@ random Component(s). After each player combat, if there are no items on your bench (other than Consumables), gain @XP@ XP.
name: Slammin'

desc: Your team can no longer critically strike. Convert each @CritChancePercent@% Critical Strike Chance into @ADPerCrit*100@% Attack Damage. Gain a Sparring Gloves.
name: Bad Luck Protection

desc: Gain +@TeamSize@ maximum team size, but your units can only hold 1 item and their total health is reduced by @HealthReduction*100@%. Gain @Gold@ gold.
name: Endless Hordes

desc: Your champions gain @HealthPerInterest@ permanent max health per interest you earn. Your max interest is increased to @MaxInterest@. Gain @Gold@ gold.
name: Investment Strategy II

desc:
Your team gains @DamageAmpBonus*100@% Damage Amp for each Bronze-tier trait.

Damage Amp Bonus: @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT_Augment_BronzeForLife_CurrentDamageAmp@%
name: Bronze For Life I

desc: Your champions gain @HealthPerInterest@ permanent max health per interest you earn.
name: Investment Strategy I

desc: Gain a Zz'Rot Portal and another after every @NumberOfCombats@ player combats. Zz'Rot Portal Voidlings gain @BonusAS*100@% Attack Speed and @BonusOmnivamp*100@% Omnivamp.
name: Void Swarm

desc: The first time you buy XP each round, gain @goldtogive@ gold. Whenever you buy XP, reroll your Shop.
name: Dual Purpose

desc: Gain an Ionic Spark. Your Ionic Sparks have +@hexincreasetooltip@ hex radius and do @effectincrease*100@% more damage.
name: High Voltage

desc: Gain +@TeamSize@ maximum team size, but your units can only hold 1 item and their total health is reduced by @HealthReduction*100@%. Gain @Gold@ gold.
name: Endless Hordes +

desc: Gain a random 2-star two-cost and 2 random 2-star one-cost champions.
name: Two Trick

desc: If an ally starts combat next to a higher-cost ally, it gains @AS*100@% Attack Speed and @Health@ Health.
name: Mentorship I

desc: When a unit dies, the nearest ally gains a @ShieldRatio*100@% max Health Shield and @AttackSpeed*100@% stacking Attack Speed.
name: Inspiring Epitaph

desc: If an ally starts combat next to a higher-cost ally, it gains @AS*100@% Attack Speed and @Health@ Health.
name: Mentorship II

desc: Combat start: Your highest Attack Speed champion gains @AbilityPower@ Ability Power and @AttackSpeed*100@% Attack Speed. Repeat on another ally every @TransferDuration@ seconds.
name: Blazing Soul I

desc: Your champion that starts combat in the center of the front row gains @BonusDamage*100@% Damage Amp and @BonusHealth*100@% max Health.
name: Find Your Center

desc: Champions that aren't holding items have a @dropchance*100@% chance to drop @Gold@ gold on death.
name: Good For Something I

desc: Gain 1 random completed item now, and 1 component after @NumRounds@ player combats. Selling champions breaks completed items into components (excluding Tactician's items and Emblems).
name: Salvage Bin+

desc:
Lose all your gold. After @Rounds@ player combats, gain back the original amount and another @BaseGold@ gold.

Incoming Gold: @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT_Augment_ForwardThinkingGold@
name: Forward Thinking

desc: Gain @StartingEmblems@ random emblem. At the start of every Stage, gain a random emblem. Your team gains @HPPerEmblem@ Health for each emblem they are holding.
name: Flexible

desc: Remove all champions on your board and bench. Gain @3Cost@ random 2-star 3-costs,  @2Cost@ 2-star 2-costs, and @1Cost@ 2-star 1-cost champion.
name: Restart Mission

desc: Gain @NumUnits@ random 5-cost champions and @NumComponents@ copies of a random component.
name: Duo Queue

desc: Champions on your bench permanently gain @HPBonus@ Health, @Stats@% Attack Damage, and @Stats@ Ability Power every round. Champions start with @StartingStacks@ stack of this effect, and can stack up to @MaxStacks@ times.
name: Preparation II

desc: Your team's attacks Burn their targets for @BurnPercent@% of their max Health over @Duration@ seconds. Attacks also reduce their targets' healing received by @HealingReductionPct@%.
name: Blistering Strikes

desc: Gain @components@ random component(s) and @XPNow@ XP now. After each player combat, if there are no items on your bench (other than Consumables), gain @XP@ XP.
name: Slammin'+

desc: When you buy XP, gain an additional @XP@. Gain @InitialXP@ immediately.
name: Level Up!

desc:
Gain three 2-cost champions. If you 3-star two of them, gain an orb filled with loot. Gain a Lesser Champion Duplicator at the start of next @NumStages@ stages.

Champions: @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT_Augment_ExaltedAdventure_Champs@, @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT_Augment_ExaltedAdventure_Champs2@, @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT_Augment_ExaltedAdventure_Champs3@
name: An Exalted Adventure

desc: Your units gain @AD*100@% Attack Damage and @AP@ Ability Power for each non-unique Trait active across your team.
name: Stand United I

desc: The first time you activate @NumTraits@ non-unique traits for 1 combat, gain @NumEmblems@ random emblems.
name: Trait Tracker

desc: Combat start:  Up to @MaxUnits@ champions holding 2 items gain a recommended 3rd completed item.
name: Binary Airdrop

desc: Gain @NumComponents@ random component, @Gold@ gold, and @NumChamps@ random 5-cost champion.
name: One, Two, Five!

desc: Gain @Experience@ XP.
name: Silver Spoon

desc: Each combat, @NumUnits@ random champions in your last two rows gain @BonusAD*100@% Attack Damage and @BonusAP@ Ability Power.
name: Calculated Enhancement

desc: Now, and at the start of every stage, gain @XP@ XP and @Rerolls@ free rerolls.
name: Epoch+

desc: Gain a Support Anvil and a completed item anvil.
name: Final Polish

desc: After @PlayersDead@ players are eliminated, gain @Gold@ gold.
name: Survivor

desc: Your units gain @ManaGain@ Mana on kill. Gain a completed item Anvil.
name: Axiom Arc III

desc: You can see who you will fight next. Gain @NumDummies@ Training Dummies, each equipped with a Zephyr or Shroud of Stillness.
name: Future Sight II

desc: Gain a Randuin's Omen. Its range is increased by 1 hex and its effect is increased by @effectincrease*100@%.
name: Immovable Object

desc: Gain @NumItems@ Giant's Belts. Your Giant's Belts grant +@BonusHealth@ bonus Health.
name: Belt Overflow

desc: Gain @tier1champs@ 1-cost champion, @numchamps@ 2-cost champions, and 1 3-cost champion.
name: Ones Twos Three

desc: Choose 1 of @ArmoryChoiceCount@ Support items.
name: Support Cache

desc:
For every @AllyDeaths@ ally champions that die, gain a random component (max @NumComponents@).

Deaths Remaining: @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT_Augment_EyeForAnEyeDeaths@
name: Eye For An Eye

desc:
Gain an Infinity Force. After @CombatNum@ player combats, gain another.

Infinity Force: Artifact that offers tons of offensive and defensive stats
name: Phreaky Friday

desc: When you level up, gain a number of free shop refreshes equal to your level+@BonusRollPerLevel@. Gain @Gold@ gold.

desc: Whenever you craft a completed item, gain @Rerolls@ rerolls.
name: Crafted Crafting

desc: Gain +@MaxArmySizeIncrease@ max team size, but take @PlayerCombatDamageIncrease@% more player damage when you lose a player combat.
name: Cursed Crown

desc: Gain @InstantGold@ gold now and @RoundGold@ gold every round.
name: Raining Gold+

desc:
Whenever you would get a component, gain a component anvil instead. Gain a random component.

The anvil offers 4 choices.
name: Component Buffet

desc: Gain @component@ item components. Every @WinsNeeded@ wins gives you an item component.

desc:
Gain @LesserDuplicatorAmount@ Lesser Champion Duplicators. Gain @Gold@ gold.

This item allows you to copy a 3-cost or less champion.

desc: Champions on your bench permanently gain @HPBonus@ Health, @Stats@% Attack Damage, and @Stats@ Ability Power every round. Champions start with @StartingStacks@ stack of this effect, and can stack up to @MaxStacks@ times.
name: Preparation I

desc: Gain @Gold@ gold. At the start of each round, gain 1 Shop reroll for every @GoldPerReroll@ gold above @GoldThreshold@ (max @MaxGold@ gold).
name: Invested++

desc: Gain @NumItems@ Needlessly Large Rods. Your Needlessly Large Rods grant +@BonusStat*100@% Attack Speed.
name: Wand Overflow

desc:
Gain a Rascal's Gloves item. This equips 2 random Radiant items every round.

Radiant items are very powerful versions of completed items.
name: Roll The Dice

desc: Combat Start: @NumUnits@ random 1-cost champion is upgraded to 4-star for that round and gains @ADBonus*100@% Attack Damage and @APBONUS@ Ability Power.
name: Greater Moonlight

desc: Your team gains @PercHP*100@% max Health and @DamageAmp*100@% Damage Amp for each unique one-cost champion on your board. Gain @NumChampsToGrant@ one-costs.
name: One For All II

desc: After @Delay@ seconds of combat, your units gain @DamageAmp@% Damage Amp.
name: Ascension

desc: Your team gains @Resistances@ Armor and Magic Resist for each unit that starts combat in the front two rows.
name: Lineup

desc:
Round start: items on your bench are randomized.

Gain @NumComponents@ random components.
name: Pandora's Items II

desc: Units that start combat in the back row begin combat at @Health*100@% health but gain @DamageAmp*100@% Damage Amp.
name: Glass Cannon II

desc: Champions on your board permanently transform into random champions 1 cost tier higher (max 5). Gain @NumRemovers@ Magnetic Removers.
name: Recombobulator

desc: For the next stage, you only get @BenchSlots@ bench slots. After, get @Components@ item components.
name: Over Encumbered

desc: Your 4-cost and 5-cost champions gain @health@ Health and @AttackSpeed*100@% Attack Speed  for every 1-cost and 2-cost champion on your board.
name: Little Buddies

desc: Every third attack deals an additional @BonusDamage*100@% damage and heals @PercentHeal*100@% of the damage. Excess healing is converted to a shield up to @MaxShield@ Health.
name: Overheal

desc: Gain a Bramble Vest. Your Bramble Vests deal @damageamp1*100@-@damageamp4*100@% more damage (based on Stage) and heal the holder for @heal*100@% of the damage dealt.
name: Thorn-Plated Armor

desc: Your team gains @BaseAS@% Attack Speed now. Each round after, they gain @IncreasePerRound@% more. (current Attack Speed: @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT9_PumpingUp3Rounds@%)
name: Pumping Up III

desc: Your team gains @BaseAS@% Attack Speed now. Each round after, they gain @IncreasePerRound@% more. (current Attack Speed: @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT9_PumpingUp2Rounds@%)
name: Pumping Up II

desc: Set your win streak to +@Streak@. Gain @Gold@ gold.
name: Called Shot

desc:
Gain a random component. For every @AllyDeaths@ ally champions that die, gain another component (max @NumComponents@).

Deaths Remaining: @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT_Augment_EyeForAnEyeDeaths@
name: Eye For An Eye+

desc: Gain @Gold@ gold. At the start of each round, gain 1 Shop reroll for every @GoldPerReroll@ gold above @GoldThreshold@ (max @MaxGold@ gold).

desc: Gain @InstantGold@ gold now and @RoundGold@ gold every round.
name: Raining Gold

desc:
Roll 3 dice. Gain rewards based on their total.

desc: Gain @NumItems@ BF Swords. Your BF Swords grant +@BonusStat*100@% Attack Speed.
name: Sword Overflow

desc: If there are no champions on your bench at the end of player combat, gain @XP@ XP.
name: Clear Mind

desc:
Gain a random @unittier@-cost champion. Gain another copy of them at the start of each round for the rest of the game.

Champion: @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT_Augment_WorthTheWait@
name: Worth the Wait II

desc: Increase your current and max player health by @Heal@. On carousel rounds you are released earlier, but are much slower.
name: Titanic Titan

desc: Sell your board and bench. Gain @NumUnits@ random 2-star @tier@ cost champions. Disable your Shop for the next @roundstoskip@ rounds.
name: Delayed Start

desc: Gain a Training Dummy with @NumOfEmblems@ permanently attached Emblems. Gain @Gold@ gold.
name: Wandering Trainer I

desc: Gain @Numrolls@ free Shop rerolls.
name: Rolling For Days I

desc: Your team gains @attackspeed*100@% Attack Speed every @frequency@ seconds in combat.
name: Clockwork Accelerator

desc: Gain a random 3-star 1-cost champion. Gain @Gold@ gold.
name: Build a Bud!

desc: After winning player combat, gain @Gold@ gold. If they had more health than you, gain @WinBonusGold@ Gold instead. Gain @Gold@ gold.
name: Kingslayer

desc: Your team gains @damageamp@% Damage Amp. After @delay@ seconds, this increases to @AscendedAmpTOOLTIPONLY@% Damage Amp.
name: Final Ascension

desc: When your first ally dies each combat, grant your team @BaseResists@ + @SharePerc*100@% of that ally's Armor and Magic Resistance.
name: Noble Sacrifice

desc:
1-cost and 2-cost units in your shop have a chance to be 2-star. Gain @Gold@ gold.

Current Chances: @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT_Augment_StarryNight_Odds@%
Chances increase with player level.
name: Starry Night

desc: Enemy champions in the first two rows lose @ResistLoss@ Armor and Magic Resist every @Time@ seconds.
name: Corrosion

desc: When you reach Level @LevelReq@, gain @Gold@ gold.
name: Lategame Specialist

desc: Lose all champions on your board and bench. Gain a Golem with @HealthPercent@% of their combined Health and @ADPercent@% of their combined Attack Damage. The Golem gains @HPPerStage@ Health per stage.
name: Golemify

desc: Gain a 2-star champion and @Gold@ gold every time you level up. The champion's cost tier is your level minus 4 (max: 5-cost).
name: Birthday Present

desc: Gain a Red Buff. Your Burns deal @BurnIncrease*100@% increased damage.
name: Pyromaniac

desc:
Gain a Mogul's Mail. In @combatnum@ rounds, gain a Gamblers Blade.

These items give gold as well as combat power.
name: Shimmerscale Essence

desc: Gain a random Emblem.
name: Branching Out

desc: Enemies have a @LootDropChance*100@% chance to drop loot when killed.
name: Spoils of War III

desc: Enemies have a @LootDropChance*100@% chance to drop loot when killed.
name: Spoils of War II

desc: Now, and at the start of each Stage, open a Shop of 4 unique 4-cost champions and gain @GoldPerStage@ gold.
name: Subscription Service

desc: Your team gains @AD*100@% Attack Damage and @Mana@ Mana. Gain a B.F. Sword.
name: Spear's Will

desc: The next 4-cost champion you buy is instantly upgraded to 2-star. Gain @Gold@ gold.
name: ReinFOURcement

desc: Units can no longer be benched or sold after fighting in a player combat. After each player combat, units that fought gain @HPScale@ Health, @ADScale*100@% Attack Damage, and @APScale@% Ability Power.
name: NO SCOUT NO PIVOT

desc: Your team gains @AttackSpeed*100@% Attack Speed if at least @MinUnits@ allies start combat in the back two rows.
name: Backup

desc: Gain a Training Dummy. Every @GoldDuration@ seconds, all Training Dummies grant @GoldAmount@ gold.
name: Gold For Dummies

desc:
Units holding exactly 1 item upgrade that item to Radiant. Units holding Radiant items gain @BonusHealth*100@% Health. Gain @NumRemovers@ Magnetic Removers.

Thief's Gloves counts as multiple items.
name: Quality Over Quantity

desc: Your team gains @AttackSpeed*100@% Attack Speed. Gain @Gold@ gold.
name: Placebo

desc: Gain @GoldContained@ gold. For the next @Rounds@ rounds, enemy champions drop @PercCost@ gold when killed.
name: Malicious Monetization

desc: At the start of each turn, all units holding a Frying Pan or Spatula item grant the nearest champion @Health@ permanent Health. Gain a Frying Pan.
name: Cooking Pot

desc:
Round start: items on your bench are randomized.

Gain 1 random Radiant item.
name: Pandora's Items III

desc: The first @NumDeaths@ enemy champions that are killed each combat grant a champion on your team a temporary completed item.
name: Scavenger

desc: Gain a free Shop reroll every round. Gain @Gold@ gold.
name: Trade Sector

desc: Each round, gain a 1-star copy of the first champion you killed last combat.
name: Pilfer

desc:
Gain @NumItems@ random components, @Gold@ gold, and 1 Reforger.

Reforgers allow you to remake any item.
name: Big Grab Bag

Gain a component anvil when you reach level @levelreqa@, @levelreqb@, @levelreqc@, and @levelreqd@.

The anvil offers 4 choices.
name: Caretaker's Favor

As you level, gain more powerful items.
Level @levelreqa@: component anvil
Level @levelreqb@: completed item anvil
Level @levelreqc@: choose 1 of 5 Radiant items
name: Caretaker's Chosen

desc: Each time your Shop is rerolled, you have a @RerollPercent@% chance to gain a free reroll.

desc:
Gain a random @UnitTier@-cost champion now. Gain the same one again every time you level up.

name: Caretaker's Ally

desc: After losing your combat, gain @Gold@ gold and a free Shop reroll.
name: Calculated Loss

desc: Combat start: Up to @MaxUnits@ champions with @MaxItemsToBeEligible@ or fewer items gain a copy of a random completed item from the nearest itemized ally.
name: Sponging

desc: Your Tactician loses @Health@ Health, but after @PlayerCombatNum@ player combats, gain @Gold@ gold.
name: Risky Moves

desc: Combat start: @NumUnits@ random 1-cost champion is upgraded to 3-star for that round and gains @ADBonus*100@% Attack Damage and @APBONUS@ Ability Power.
name: Moonlight

desc: Gain @NumGloves@ Thief's Gloves.
name: Band of Thieves I

desc: During non-player combat rounds, your shop refreshes for free every @RefreshTimer@ seconds for @TotalTimer@ seconds.
name: Shop Glitch

desc:
Gain an Artifact anvil now and after every @NumberOfCombats@ player combats.

Artifacts are more powerful items with a unique effect.
name: Living Forge

desc:
Gain a 2-star 2-cost champion. After dealing @PlayerDamage@ player damage, gain a chest of high cost champions and items.
(Current: @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT_Augment_Warpath_DamageCount@)
name: Warpath

desc: Allies that start combat next to exactly 1 other ally gain @HealthBonus@ Health. When that champion dies, the other gains a @ShieldAmount*100@% max Health Shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds.
name: Bulky Buddies II

desc: Allies that start combat next to exactly 1 other ally gain @HealthBonus@ Health. When that champion dies, the other gains a @ShieldAmount*100@% max Health Shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds.
name: Bulky Buddies III

desc:
Choose 1 of @ArmoryChoiceCount@ Radiant items. Gain a Magnetic Remover.

Radiant items are very powerful versions of completed items.

desc: Allies that start combat next to exactly 1 other ally gain @HealthBonus@ Health. When that champion dies, the other gains a @ShieldAmount*100@% max Health Shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds.
name: Bulky Buddies I

desc: Your units that start combat next to an ally with over @RequiredHealth@ Health take @DamageReductionPercent@% less damage for the rest of combat.

desc: Gain a Sparring Gloves. Your team gains @AS*100@% Attack Speed and @CritChance*100@% Critical Strike Chance.

desc: Get a Golem with tailored offensive items. It gets stronger at the start of each Stage.

desc: Gain @Heal@ player health and @Gold@ gold after every player combat. Your Tactician also moves faster. Gain @InitialGold@ gold now.

desc: Now, and at the start of every stage, gain @XP@ XP and @Rerolls@ free rerolls.

Round start: items on your bench are randomized.

The anvil offers 4 choices. Artifacts are more powerful items with a unique effect.
